meta.title: RingCentral | Case Study
meta.description: Aviso AI Builds Better Sales Discipline and Coaching for RingCentral Sales Strategy & Operations To Scale Growth

content.subtitle: CASE STUDY
content.title: RingCentral Builds Better Sales Discipline and Coaching with Aviso Aviso AI Builds Better

content.subtitle: TECHNOLOGY
content.description: Founded in 1999, RingCentral is a global provider of cloud enterprise unified communications and collaboration solutions

items.title: Aviso has greatly helped us in driving more transparency, conversation, and incremental growth. I highly recomment Aviso to global operations and strategy teams to run their business with the power of predictive AI.
items.description: Kanish Jindal, Head of Global Sales Strategy, RingCentral

content.title: A high volume of transactions and short sales cycles at RingCentral created a lot of data (which changed very rapidly) that made reporting and analysis difficult with just spreadsheets

items.title: Challenges Faced
items.description:
• Poor reporting and analysis due to a lot of disconnected spreadsheets
  • Pipeline coverage and processes were very different for different segments
  • Lack of real time visibility on deals
  • Building pipeline views took a lot of time and programming

items.title: Solution Provided
items.description:
• Customized System of AI-powered Nudges
  • Predictive forecasting and dashboards
  • Activity and Relationship Intelligence insights to manage actual activities of sales reps
  • Pipeline Intelligence and Pipeline Building Insights

content.title: Benefits for RingCentral
content.description: A high volume of transactions and short sales cycles at RingCentral created a lot of data (which changed very rapidly) that made reporting and analysis difficult with just spreadsheets

items.title: Improved forecast accuracy inline with the company outlook
Standard set of data and templates to help everyone look at data in the same way
Improved revenue outcomes through Sales leaders accessing data on top/specific deals early in the quarter to address any coaching or process gaps
More precise Coaching feedback by Sales managers instead of one-size-fits-all
Better inspection, hygiene and outcomes for reps & managers with automated nudges
